title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker or npm dev.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client SDK for Ollama; Maven Central artifact ollama4j.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with history, syntax highlighting; pip install ollama-cli.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline code copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama; use local models in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tuning, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that serves Ollama models in chat channels; Docker ready.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need local LLM inference via Ollama.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service wrapper exposing OpenAI-compatible endpoints over Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async client for Ollama; crates.io ollama-rs.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that queries local Ollama models; configurable slash command.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.
